name: Profile Box Shortcode And Widget
author: A WP Life

sections.description:
Like Box Widget & Shortcode – Social Profile

A very easy and simple facebook like box widget & shortcode plugin for wordPress websites/blogs.

You can promote any page with like box. It is also responsive so you can use it on any page and post.

You can attract visitor to your page with like box and divert your site trafic to your page.

To activate like box widget on your website. Go to widgets area in admin dashboard, find the “Like box Widget” named widget and activate in any widget of theme.

For pages and groups you can choose the user roles whose posts will be shared- page owner/ group admin, group member/page fans or both. Hashtags and mentions included in posts will be preserved. The page plugin comes with a number of great features and functionality to allow you create anything from free simple feeds to custom feeds, including group events, like box, feed gallery and more to increase engagement of your fans.

Major features in Like Box plugin include:

  • Like box Widget
  • Like box Shortcode
  • Custom Application ID
  • Custom Widget Title
  • Widget Custom Width (Min Width: 180 – Max Width: 500)
  • Widget Custom Height (Min Height: 70 )
  • Full Width Widget
  • Show Page Cover
  • Show Page Header
  • Small And Large Page Header
  • Show Friends
  • Show Page Post/Stream
  • 43 Language support for like box
sections.installation:
Install like box Widget & Shortcode either via the WordPress.org plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server.

After activating Install like box Widget & Shortcode, go to widgets menu under appearance menu.

Find the widget named with ‘like box Widget and shortcode’.

Now drag and drop the widget in available widget areas into your theme.

Finally, configure your widget setting and save.

That’s it. You’re ready to go!

sections.reviews:
Works good

By arvind chaurasiya (arvindchaurasiya009) on December 23, 2018

I found it really interesting, especially its like box with shortcodes is my favorite function.

Not Responsive

By amorino1980 on September 14, 2018

8o% of users use mobile devices. Responsive should be standard on all plugins but it is not. The same goes for this one. Out of date

So easy to manage

By ignazio_ on June 13, 2017

Excellent plugin, updated to the last version of wp (4.8). Widget auto width needs to be improved for responsive.

Likebox With Shortcode

By A WP Life (awordpresslife) on May 10, 2017

You can add many like boxes because this plugin also works in CPT. You can show your different facebook profiles.

Not responsive

By mrboats (wpseiskaadmin) on January 8, 2017

The widget is not responsive ie the function to scale widget width does not work, it only allows fixed width.

Works OK but no shortcode

By jjanthony on December 2, 2016

Facebook Likebox Widget & Shortcode Plugin For WordPress works ok as a widget but I cannot find any shortcode. I did find a promise of future plans for shortcode in the support section. ********** EDIT ********** They've been working on the plugin and improving it, added the shortcode and so I have bumped up my rating a star

Good plugin but contains hidden link (fixed)

By Yakti-R (yakti-ruud) on September 3, 2016

The plugin itself is good and very easy to use. It offers all the options you need to display your facebook widget.

However, today I discovered that the plugin includes a back link to the developers website, which is hidden from view using display:none styling. I'm fine with developers including an option to turn on/off a back link, which is also stated as in the plugin development guidelines. But hiding these links from view without consent of the user is not only undesirable but I believe it also violates the plugin guidelines:

The plugin must not embed external links on the public site (like a “powered by” link) without explicitly asking the user’s permission. Any such options in the plugin must default to NOT show the link.
source

Where the guidelines say, "default to NOT show the link", I don't think they mean that it is ok to hide it by using css.

Also, such hidden links can inflict your SEO score, since Google and other search engines don't like these.

So, although the plugin is very good, only one star because of such very bad practice.

UPDATE
The author fixed the issue, so now the plugin is worth its five stars.

great - works perfectly

By uniterre on September 3, 2016

This plugin is very easy to configure and use : you just have to go to widget menus in order to put the right parameters and display it !

short_description: A very easy and simple facebook likebox shortcode and widget plugin with mini profile, like Button, Share Button plugin For WordPress
